divs: Sighting DetailsWe were (7) all out side around 9:30am this morning and one of us looked up in the sky and noticed an object. We all than focused on the object and it continued to remain in the same location for a span of 30 minutes. One from our party thought they were possibly be a balloon but it was to high up and was stationary. When a second object appeared just a few hundred yards to the right of the first object and watched the two for about 5 minutes when the second object disappeared out of sight. After around 25 minutes went by when i tried to focus with a pair of high powered binoculars and in doing so i noticed it was perfectly round in shape with a yellowish metalic coloration. After 30 minutes the object disappeared and we were unable to relocate the object.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in West Covina
There were no other sightings in West Covina on or around January 9th 2010
